doc:
Paul Marcarelli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Marcarelli 0 Paul Marcarelli (born May 24, 1970) is an American actor, best known as the spokesperson for Verizon. Previously, he was the ubiquitous "Test Man" character in commercials ("Can you hear me now?") for Verizon Wireless. He appeared in all of his Verizon commercials wearing a gray Verizon jacket and his own horn-rimmed glasses until 2011. Paul_Marcarelli ( born May_24_,_1970 ) is an_American_actor , best_known as the_spokesperson for Verizon . Previously , he was the_ubiquitous_"_Test_Man_"_character in commercials ( " Can you hear me now ? " ) for Verizon_Wireless . He appeared in all of his_Verizon_commercials wearing a_gray_Verizon_jacket and his_own_horn-rimmed_glasses until 2011 .
